TEXT.TITLE: KLEINERT'S INC <KLRT> 1ST QTR ENDS FEB 28 NET
TEXT.BODY: Shr 24 cts vs 18 cts Net 359,000 vs 297,000 Revs 5,724,000 vs 6,430,000 Avg shrs 1,475,0000 vs 1,668,000 NOTE: qtrs include tax gain of 147,000 vs 137,000. Prior qtr ended March 1, 1986. Reuter
